description: A robotic student that is powered by magic. Because of this he is heavily affected to Suzuho`s magic stealing ability. He is initially hinted to be homosexual and attracted to his friend George, although technically he doesn`t have a gender. However, it turns out that he is actually in love with the Midnight Blue Vampire, Suzuho`s other personality, and he is willing to risk his own life to save hers. Though he knows she has feelings for Takuto, he keeps trying to impress her though he needs to run off a separate battery system to be able to chat with her.
name: Metallis
